name: Underwater (itch)
description:
Underwater is an arcade game where you should try to survive as much time as possible.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Made by Alberto "_beta" Mellado.

-----------------------

Written in Js using Box2d.

ansimuz -> Art

-----------------------

Movement -> WASD
